channel.title: Regalia for Story book pages
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Regalia for Story book pages" - Highest winner in a week gets it unless no one bids past minimum (not saying what it is to encourage massively over bidding)

item.title: Regalia for Story book pages
item.content:encoded:
Trading 1 regalia (+1 Range, +1 Strength, may Attack Villages twice a day) for massive amounts of story book pages (don't be afraid to bid low, or insanely high)
Other acceptable trades:
Massive amounts of treasure
Golden Potions (multiple)
Sho Nuff Elixir(ooh, I'ld love you forever)
Thank you potions (If anyone still has these they are insane)
Mantis Rune (maybe)
